items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

items.name: static let gameChat: AVAudioSession.Mode
items.desc: A mode that the GameKit framework sets on behalf of an application that uses GameKitâ€™s voice chat service.

items.name: static let measurement: AVAudioSession.Mode
items.desc: A mode that indicates that your app is performing measurement of audio input or output.

items.name: static let moviePlayback: AVAudioSession.Mode
items.desc: A mode that indicates that your app is playing back movie content.

items.name: static let spokenAudio: AVAudioSession.Mode
items.desc: A mode used for continuous spoken audio to pause the audio when another app plays a short audio prompt.

items.name: static let videoChat: AVAudioSession.Mode
items.desc: A mode that indicates that your app is engaging in online video conferencing.

items.name: static let videoRecording: AVAudioSession.Mode
items.desc: A mode that indicates that your app is recording a movie.

items.name: static let voiceChat: AVAudioSession.Mode
items.desc: A mode that indicates that your app is performing two-way voice communication, such as using Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP).

items.name: static let voicePrompt: AVAudioSession.Mode
items.desc: A mode that indicates that your app plays audio using text-to-speech.
